briefTitle: Proxalutamide (GT0918) Treatment for Outpatients With Mild or Moderate COVID-19 Illness
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Proxalutamide (GT0918) in Outpatients With Mild to Moderate COVID-19 Illness
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of Proxalutamide (GT0918) as a treatment for outpatients COVID-19 subjects.

primaryOutcome.measure: Efficacy in Terms of Clinical Status Following Treatment With Pruxelutamide (GT0918) Compared to Placebo
